item.description:
The movie show time is 8PM this week. Let's meet at 7:30 at the up escalators to the left, just past the front doors. For those who are new, I wear a little badge to help people recognize me. Please be as prompt as possible. We like to go in a bit early so we can sit together.

Please note, this movie theater can be quite busy on Saturday nights...I recommend buying your tickets ahead of time if you can. I bought mine on Fandago already!

I do check the web site for rsvp changes throughout the day on Saturday. If your plans change please update the web site so the group doesn't hang around waiting for a no show.

If people are interested, after the show, we can descend on a local establishment for food/drinks.
item.name: The Breach
